channel.title: Duel arena help
channel.description: Hi , i need help getting my duel arena to teleport the other person too , it only teleports me to the duel arena when the fight starts..can somebody help?

item.title: Duel arena help
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

if (dw.duelConfirmed2) { teleportToX = 3345 + misc.random(5); teleportToY = 3251 + misc.random(5);
This part i think. You set it to tele yourself when that player accepts so make it to

					dw.teleportToX = 3345 + misc.random(5);
					dw.teleportToY = 3251 + misc.random(5);

Try that

Read full topic

item.title: Duel arena help
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

well this is what i have atm where would i stick your code in?

[code] if (dw.duelConfirmed2) {
teleportToX = 3345 + misc.random(5);
teleportToY = 3251 + misc.random(5);
startDuel();
dw.startDuel();
} else {

sendQuest(“Waiting for other player…”, 6571);
dw.sendQuest(“Other player has accepted”, 6571);
}
break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Duel arena help
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

Make some code that involves both people in a void, boolean W-E like

if (darena == true) {
teleportx = bla;
teleporty = bla;
}

or you can do something like

darena.teleportx = bla;
darena.teleporty = bla;

im pulling this out of my ass so you need to move these things around

Read full topic
